entry.title: Ukraine Says Fight for Soledar Isn't Over Despite Russian Gains
entry.content: Russian forces spearheaded by the Wagner paramilitary group have advanced into Soledar in recent days, shifting their firepower there after months of failed attempts to seize the nearby city of Bakhmut.

entry.title: China's Precarious Moment: Covid Everywhere and Few Restrictions
entry.content: Parts of Chinaâ€™s economy are bouncing back, but Infections have skyrocketed, medical facilities are stretched to their limits and the elderly are dying. Lunar New Year holiday travel risks furthering the spread.

entry.title: Biden Administration's Big Manufacturing Push Could Transform Global Trade
entry.content: How the U.S. implements its industrial-policy measures will determine whether its allies respond with their own protectionist efforts.

entry.title: Asia, Europe Look to Collective Action to Restrain China
entry.content: Asian democracies reliant on the backstop of U.S. military power for their prosperity face a new reality now that China rivals the U.S. in areas such as advanced missiles and naval hardware.
